title: What Twins Tell Us
description: Twin studies aren't just for twins. They're a paradigm for all of us, a way to explore an old question: how much are we shaped by our genes, and how much by our environment?
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: Twin studies aren't just for twins. They're a paradigm for all of us, a way to explore an old question: how much are we shaped by our genes, and how much by our environment?
